category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_RelationBrowser_Context
preference.preference_description: Defines the default context to be selected in the "Relation Browser" view of the Rich client. The valid value can be found in "Context" tag of graph_config.xml. The default is "com.teamcenter.rac.tcgrb.ctx.Default".
